url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Words of Power/Class Word Lists/Cleric_Oracle Words

sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Words of Power/Class Word Lists/Cleric_Oracle Words/0-Level Cleric_Oracle Words
sections.name: 0-Level Cleric/Oracle Words

sections.body: Alignment Shield (Alignment), Decipher* (Language), Fog Bank (Weather), Force Block* (Armor), Fortify (Body), Lesser Cure (Healing), Lesser Wound (Wounding), Radiance (Illumination), Sense Alignment (Detection), Servitor I (Summoning), Simple Order (Command), Soothing Touch* (Healing), Spook (Fear), Wrack (Pain)
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Words of Power/Class Word Lists/Cleric_Oracle Words/1st-Level Cleric_Oracle Words
sections.name: 1st-Level Cleric/Oracle Words

sections.body: Discordant Note (Sonic), Energy Resistance (Body), Enhance Form (Body), Gloom (Illumination), Moderate Cure (Healing), Moderate Wound (Wounding), Paralyze Humanoid (Binding), Predict (Time), Sense Alignment* (Detection), Sense Hidden (Detection), Servitor II (Summoning), Suppress (Dispelling), Undeath (Death)
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Words of Power/Class Word Lists/Cleric_Oracle Words/2nd-Level Cleric_Oracle Words
sections.name: 2nd-Level Cleric/Oracle Words

sections.body: Damage (Destruction), Far Sight (Divination), Force Armor (Armor), Greater Cure (Healing), Greater Wound (Wounding), Sense Alignment* (Detection), Servitor III (Summoning), Sunshine (Illumination), Suppress* (Dispelling), Wind Wall (Wall)
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Words of Power/Class Word Lists/Cleric_Oracle Words/3rd-Level Cleric_Oracle Words
sections.name: 3rd-Level Cleric/Oracle Words

sections.body: Elder Cure (Healing), Elder Wound (Wounding), Grave Bane (Death), Perfect Form (Body), Purify (Life), Servitor IV (Summoning), Simple Order* (Command), Soar (Flight), Translate (Language)
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Words of Power/Class Word Lists/Cleric_Oracle Words/4th-Level Cleric_Oracle Words
sections.name: 4th-Level Cleric/Oracle Words

sections.body: Alignment Assault (Alignment), Cinder Storm (Fire), Dimensional Shift (Teleportation), Far Casting (Language), Far Sight* (Divination), Resist Arcana (Dispelling), Revive (Life), Servitor V (Summoning), Stone Wall (Wall), Unmake (Dispelling)
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Words of Power/Class Word Lists/Cleric_Oracle Words/5th-Level Cleric_Oracle Words
sections.name: 5th-Level Cleric/Oracle Words

sections.body: Blade Wall (Wall), Energy Immunity (Body), Far Casting* (Language), Locate (Divination), Sense Hidden* (Detection), Servitor VI (Summoning), Slay (Death)

sections.name: 6th-Level Cleric/Oracle Words
